    public abstract class AbstractReplacementHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReplacementHelper
    Base ReplacementHelper implementation.

      • appendReplacement

        public void appendReplacement(java.lang.StringBuffer sb,
                     java.util.regex.Matcher matcher,
                     DataRecord values)
        Description copied from interface: ReplacementHelper
        Analogous to Matcher.appendReplacement(StringBuffer, String).
        1. Appends to the target StringBuffer the input starting from the current Matcher position up to the beginning of the next match.
        2. Appends the replacement value from the referenced field of the DataRecord.
        3. Updates Matcher position.
        Specified by:
        appendReplacement in interface ReplacementHelper
        Parameters:
        sb - target StringBuffer
        matcher - the Matcher used for string substitution
        values - DataRecord containing the replacement values
        See Also:
        Matcher.appendReplacement(StringBuffer, String)

      • quoteReplacement

        protected java.lang.String quoteReplacement(java.lang.String input)
        Quotes the replacement value, so that group references and other special sequences are inserted as string literals.
        Parameters:
        input - replacement value
        Returns:
        quoted replacement value

        protected java.lang.String getReplacement(java.util.regex.Matcher matcher,

        Specified by:
        getMatcher in interface ReplacementHelper
        Returns:
        a new Matcher for the input
